Comments: University is for socializing; not learning.
To learn; we must develop ourselves individually. We don't need universities.
Universities are truly built to learn.
I think it is a very logical decision to go to university to hang out with our peers but it should not be preferred for learning information.
Universities are really instructive and develop ourselves in terms of knowledge.
Universities exist to socialize. It is useless and a waste of time to learn. Because self-development isn't about college.
I think universities are basically for fun and to prove you can do your chores but they're not for learning
You do not need college to learn stuff
Universities are really inadequate institutions for education.
Universities are successful and should be used for education in my opinion.
Universities are for socializing and hanging out with our peers. Education is free in world!
